content.company: Venture Capital funded IoT thermostat & vent producer
content.role: I was a full-stack developer and also implemented front-end elements for a customer support dashboard (React, Node.js).

content.company: Maker of the world's first $9 embedded computer
content.Role: I implemented automated Python scripts that tested 100k units of C.H.I.P and subseqent succeesors (IoT devices)
content.highlight: My automated script reduced total testing time by 4,583 man-hours compared to no automation previously.

content.company: Modular computer input device maker for personalized control of any software.
content.Role: I was a Co-founder and firmware engineer. I co-developed the firmware and hardware. and implemented processeses for mass production and testing (Python).
content.highlight: I developed and shipped product to 10k customers.
Built Machine learning models to predict future salaries based on job listing content (Python/Scikit-learn).
Delivered reading plans from databse, based on selected dates to 2000 users
Enables multiple conditions search of a user’s social media content, supported by Instagram’s REST API
